title: Mass Effect 1 - Paragon Profile and Save Games
description:
MASS EFFECT 1 - PARAGON PROFILE and SAVE GAMES

CHARACTER INFO:
- Character Name : Wlad
- Origin : Earthborn
- Reputation : War Hero
- Class : Engineer
- Level : 50 & 60
- Time Played : 26h08m & 51h50m
- Alignment - Full Paragon
MAJOR PLOT DECISIONS:
- Romanced Liara, Kaidan Rescued, Wrex Spared, Council Saved.
OTHER PLOT DECISIONS:
- Fist Killed on Citadel, All Colonists Saved on Feros including Shiala, Rachni Queen Spared on Noveria, Helped Gianna 

Parasini on Noveria, Garrius encourged to be Paragon, Helped Tali with Pilgrimage Quest, Spared Rana Thanoptis on 

Virmire, Helped Captain Kirrahe on Virmire, Saved the Hostages Balak during Bring Down the Sky...
- All Missions and Assignments finished, All Resources Gathered
- Used Both DLCs: Bring Down the Sky & Pinnacle Station
FOR MORE INFO ON SAVE FILE TRANSFER : masseffect(dot)wikia(dot)com/wiki/Save_File_Transfer

HOW TO INSTALL:
1. Copy all files from - Mass Effect 1 - Paragon ProfileSave
2. Paste them to - My DocumentsBioWareMass EffectSave

WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH THIS PROFILE & SAVES:
- This Save & Player Profile unlocks Level 60 for your character, so you don't need to do one 50 level playthrough just to 

unlock it.
- You can Start a new Career with level 60 unlocked (but you cannot level your character to level 60 in one playthrough 

without using some glitches, it is impossible because there is not enough XP in the game for 60 levels. More info about 

leveling and experience  - masseffect(dot)wikia(dot)com/wiki/Experience_Guide
- You can use my 50 level character and level it up to 60 in Paragon or Renegade Alignment.
- You can use my 60 level character to transfer him in Mass Effect 2 and get maximum transfer bonuses (Importing a level 

60 character will grant 4,000 XP (the player starts at level 5), 50,000 credits, and 10,000 of each resource + 100,000 

credits for Having the "Rich" achievement.

- Unfortunatly, some of the Achievements will be unlocked by copying this Profile.



Enjoy & Please SEED
Long Live Pirate Bay!

Peace to all
